fullText: Steve Carell brings a quietly devastating performance to Chekhov's masterpiece, while William Jackson Harper provides sterling support in this thoughtfully mounted revival.
dtliExcerpt: Steve Carell brings a quietly devastating performance to Chekhov's masterpiece, while William Jackson Harper provides sterling support in this thoughtfully mounted revival.
